effect:
Whenever a card with **floating memory** is banished from your graveyard, put a **lash** counter on Nico.

**On Champion Hit:** You may have that opponent put the top **X** cards of their deck into their graveyard, where **X** is the amount of **lash** counters on Nico.
effect_raw:
Whenever a card with floating memory is banished from your graveyard, put a lash counter on Nico.

On Champion Hit: You may have that opponent put the top X cards of their deck into their graveyard, where X is the amount of lash counters on Nico.
name: Nico, Whiplash Allure

rule.description: If multiple cards with floating memory are banished from your graveyard at the same time, Nico's triggered ability triggers that many times.

effect_html: Whenever a card with floating memory is banished from your graveyard, put a lash counter on Nico.On Champion Hit: You may have that opponent put the top X cards of their deck into their graveyard, where X is the amount of lash counters on Nico.

effect:
CARDNAME can only level up into another "Vanitas" champion.

**On Enter:** If there's another wind element card in CARDNAME' lineage, **glimpse 4**.
effect_raw:
Vanitas can only level up into another "Vanitas" champion.

On Enter: If there's another wind element card in Vanitas' lineage, glimpse 4.
flavor: "With just a nudge, this seed will be ripe for harvest."
name: Vanitas, Obliviate Schemer
effect_html: Vanitas can only level up into another "Vanitas" champion.On Enter: If there's another wind element card in Vanitas' lineage, glimpse 4.

effect:
**Vanitas Lineage**

Whenever you activate a Spell card, CARDNAME' next attack without a weapon this turn gets +1 [POWER].

**On Champion Hit:** If 7 or more damage was dealt, cards that opponent materializes cost 1 more to materialize until the beginning of your next turn.
effect_raw:
Vanitas Lineage

Whenever you activate a Spell card, Vanitas' next attack without a weapon this turn gets +1 POWER.

On Champion Hit: If 7 or more damage was dealt, cards that opponent materializes cost 1 more to materialize until the beginning of your next turn.
name: Vanitas, Convergent Ruin
effect_html: Vanitas LineageWhenever you activate a Spell card, Vanitas' next attack without a weapon this turn gets +1.On Champion Hit: If 7 or more damage was dealt, cards that opponent materializes cost 1 more to materialize until the beginning of your next turn.

effect:
**Divine Relic**

[REST]**:** Put a **time** counter on CARDNAME.

While paying for a memory cost, you may sacrifice CARDNAME to pay for **X** of that cost, where **X** is the amount of **time** counters on CARDNAME.
effect_raw:
Divine Relic

REST: Put a time counter on Temporal Spectrometer.

While paying for a memory cost, you may sacrifice Temporal Spectrometer to pay for X of that cost, where X is the amount of time counters on Temporal Spectrometer.
name: Temporal Spectrometer
effect_html: Divine Relic: Put a time counter on Temporal Spectrometer.While paying for a memory cost, you may sacrifice Temporal Spectrometer to pay for X of that cost, where X is the amount of time counters on Temporal Spectrometer.

effect:
[Class Bonus] **On Enter:** Put a **lash** counter on your champion.

CARDNAME gets +1 [POWER] for each **lash** counter on your champion.

[Nico Bonus] Whenever your champion is dealt non-combat damage, **recover 2**.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] On Enter: Put a lash counter on your champion.

Magebane Lash gets +1 POWER for each lash counter on your champion.

[Nico Bonus] Whenever your champion is dealt non-combat damage, recover 2.
name: Magebane Lash
effect_html: Class Bonus On Enter: Put a lash counter on your champion.Magebane Lash gets +1 for each lash counter on your champion.Nico Bonus Whenever your champion is dealt non-combat damage, recover 2.

effect:
**Hindered** *(This object enters the field rested.)* 

Materialize this card only if it's the last card in your material deck, and only if your starting material deck size was twelve.

[REST]**:** Until end of turn, you may pay (0) rather than pay a card's **starcalling** costs. When you do, **glimpse 5**.
effect_raw:
Hindered (This object enters the field rested.) 

Materialize this card only if it's the last card in your material deck, and only if your starting material deck size was twelve.

REST: Until end of turn, you may pay (0) rather than pay a card's starcalling costs. When you do, glimpse 5.
name: The Elysian Astrolabe

rule.description: If this card is not in the material deck, it can't be played.

If you starcall a card, that card is put onto the stack during the glimpse effect. It does not start resolving until after the current effect finishes resolving. For example, Scry the Skies has you glimpse 4, you starcall a card, you finish resolving Scry the Skies by drawing a card into your memory, then the effects stack can start resolving more cards.

effect_html: Hindered (This object enters the field rested.) Materialize this card only if it's the last card in your material deck, and only if your starting material deck size was twelve.: Until end of turn, you may pay 0rather than pay a card's starcalling costs. When you do, glimpse 5.
